name: Mom
text: Goodmorning, how was your sleep dear?
It was very unsettling and I had a really bad nightmare. More importantly, why are there barricades nailed into the windows and doors?
(You notice your mom averting her eyes as she hesitates to speak.)

name: Mom
text: Well...., you see, we can't go outside of the house right now.

name: Mom
text: We can't go outiside of the house because when you were sleeping, a deadly virus emerged.

name: Mom
text: Government, health, police, and fire departments are also out of service as most of the people outside when it occured turned into a...

name: Mom
text: Volotiles... They are previously humans that are basically dead but they are mindless and they are moving.

name: Mom
text: They are creatures the spread spores that may turn you into a volotile and render you dead in an instant.

name: Mom
text: The outside is also very dangerous and the virus can kill you immediately. However, the virus are big in diamter so a mask is sufficient. Either cloth or face.
Hmmmm... I get the situation now. Thanks mom for explaining, I wouldve died going outside of the door without you!
